user.title: Connect to OVO Energy Australia
user.description:
Sign in with your OVO Energy Australia account to track energy usage, costs, and solar generation.

**✨ New in v3.0.0: Automatic Plan Detection!**
• Your energy plan and rates are automatically detected from OVO's API
• No manual plan selection or rate entry required
• Setup is quick and accurate - just enter your credentials below

**Privacy & Security:**
• Credentials stored securely in Home Assistant's encrypted storage
• Used only to access your energy data via OVO's official API
• Never shared with third parties or external services
• Account ID and plan information automatically detected

**Why your password is required:**
• OVO API tokens expire every 5 minutes for security
• Automatic re-authentication keeps sensors updating 24/7
• No manual intervention needed after initial setup

**What you'll get:**
• 80+ sensors with your actual OVO plan rates
• Real-time energy usage and cost tracking
• Solar generation and feed-in credit monitoring
• Time-of-Use breakdown (Peak/Shoulder/Off-Peak)
• Plan information sensor with your current rates and NMI

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate with OVO Energy
reauth_confirm.description:
Your OVO Energy session has expired. Please sign in again to restore energy monitoring.

**What happens next:**
• Your credentials are still safely stored
• Sensors will resume updating after re-authentication
• This is a one-time action - automatic re-auth will continue

Enter your OVO Energy credentials below:

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to OVO Energy API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please verify your email address and password are correct.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or check Home Assistant logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This OVO Energy account is already configured in Home Assistant.
abort.reauth_successful: Re-authentication successful! Your energy sensors will resume updating.
